message.content:
cs.PL, cs.LO, cs.SE, cs.AI, cs.FL

This paper focuses on the termination analysis of logic programs, which is a core topic in programming languages and logic. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.PL (Programming Languages). The paper also discusses the use of backwards analysis, which is a common technique in formal methods and verification, suggesting that cs.LO (Logic in Computer Science) is also a likely category. Additionally, the paper discusses the application of the methodology to enhance a traditional termination analyser, which falls under the category of software engineering (cs.SE). The paper also discusses the use of inference, which is a common technique in artificial intelligence (cs.AI). Finally, the paper discusses the generalisation of traditional termination analysis, which is related to formal languages and automata theory (cs.FL).
